Package uk.fictitiousurl.contactmanager

Provides the classes to create a simple contact manager.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Contact
    A contact is a person we are making business with or may do in the future.
    ContactManager
    A class to manage your contacts and meetings.
    ContactManagerPlus
    Class to Manage contacts and Meetings including methods that are missing from ContactManager needed for both JUnit testing and a functional program.
    FileSaveRetrieve
    Deals with saving ContactManagerImpl state to a string and or an external text file.
    FutureMeeting
    A meeting to be held in the future
    Meeting
    A class to represent meetings Meetings have unique IDs, scheduled date and a list of participating contacts
    PastMeeting
    A meeting that was held in the past.
  • Class Summary

    A contact is a person we are making business with or may do in the future.
    ContactManagerImpl
    Class to Manage contacts and Meetings

    Deals with saving ContactManagerImpl state to a string and or an external text file.

Package uk.fictitiousurl.contactmanager Description

Provides the classes to create a simple contact manager.

A contact manager keeps track of Contacts (who will be at a meeting) and Meetings both future and past.

This development branch version uses uses XStream http://xstream.codehaus.org/ to serialize to XML format as a disk storage format.

Since:
1.0
Version:
3.0.01
Author:
Oliver Smart <osmart01@dcs.bbk.ac.uk>
